content: does anyone have leftover fade colors that are just sitting in your yarn cabinet i do i loved my fade so much i couldn t bear the thought of all that beautiful yarn just sitting there so i created the faded beanie use your leftover yarns or even create a fade using mini skeins **supplies** **fingering weight yarn ** i used a 6 color fade for this project color a brighton rock 25 grams color b you re my best friend 10 grams color c fat bottomed girls 10 grams color d save me 10 grams color e play the game 10 grams color f the hero 10 grams **recommended needles ** size us 2 1/2 3 0 mm for brim and us 4 3 5 mm for body of hat **sizing** this hat fits a 22 inch head m i used a stitch count with a multiple of 8 stitches so if you d like to make changes to the size just add/decrease 8 stitches
